name: samba
deps: libtirpc, python2, rpcsvc_proto, gpgme, libxsl, python2_pycripto, python3_pycripto, openldap_client, avahi, cyrus_sasl, gnupg, gnutls, libarchive, libcap, libgcrypt, libnsl, krb5, nss, popt, talloc, vala, xfsprogs
desc:
The Samba package provides file and print services to SMB/CIFS 
clients and Windows networking to Linux clients. Samba can also be 
configured as a Windows Domain Controller replacement, a file/print 
server acting as a member of a Windows Active Directory domain and 
a NetBIOS (rfc1001/1002) nameserver (which among other things provides 
LAN browsing support).
